changelog: Fixed Arcade menu AGAIN. Ghost Mode Support (again). Separate Challenge Pack Category in the challenges menu (Thanks @anthonyfuller ). Quick Save/Load now have quick key binds that can be enabled, because of this, the mod now requires Simple Key Event Helper (Thanks @notex ). Peacock Dashboard now shows a featured ET, rotates daily. Peacock Destinations menu now shows the safehouse/sniper missions, ambrose is in chronological order.
